entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 09:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

Temperature: -7.1°C

Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 71 %

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:26 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
